ModMetaData.name: Project RimFactory Lite
ModMetaData.author: zymex
ModMetaData.description:
This is a stripped down version of Project RimFactory Revived, containing only belts, pullers, and storage. This mod is for players you want to use our transport systems with other mods adding automation, such as Vanilla Factions Expanded - Mechanoids, without having our full automation suite loaded.
If you like this and want to see more, try out the full mod!
